item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
No wonder my install was so minty fresh afterwards. Plus, I got a letter, a letter PERSONALLY addressed to me, from the Argent Dawn. Apparently, they need help with something or other and, most importantly, they're willing to pay for this assistance.
I'm tempted to take off the afternoon to get right on that, but I'll wait until tonight.
item.content:encoded:
No wonder my install was so minty fresh afterwards. Plus, I got a letter, a letter PERSONALLY addressed to me, from the Argent Dawn. Apparently, they need help with something or other and, most importantly, they’re willing to pay for this assistance.

I’m tempted to take off the afternoon to get right on that, but I’ll wait until tonight.

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description:
the 450 meg patch is the full patch from retail to 1.11
the patch from 1.10 to 1.11 is only 150 megs
item.content:encoded:
the 450 meg patch is the full patch from retail to 1.11

the patch from 1.10 to 1.11 is only 150 megs
